jd: From: Roja Madasu, Avance Consulting roja.madasu@avanceservices.com Reply to: roja.madasu@avanceservices.com Looking for "Java Backend Developer" for contract at Plano,Texas, Jersey City,New Jersey,United States(Only Locals), please find the below JD and get back to me with the suitable profiles. Job Description:5+ years of overall experience in software engineering2+ years of experience in Java, J2EE programming, Spring Framework and design techniques and web applications/REST APIsVery strong Mongo DB Exp, there would be coding interview.Hands on with version control practices, Continuous Integration tools e.g. JenkinsKnowledge of cloud technologies – AWS, GoogleUnderstanding of relational databases e.g. Oracle, MS Sql ServerExposure to Agile based software development Following MongoDB specific capabilities:Designing and customizing MongoDB applicationsImplementing database updates and migrationDebugging and troubleshooting when issues ariseAnalyzing databases and advising on optimizing performanceUnderstanding of back-up and disaster recovery plansGood to have knowledge of big data platforms e.g., Cassandra, Hadoop, Mark logic etc.
